Example: frama-c-2013-03-13-2.c

#include <stdio.h>

int main(int c, char **v)
{
  unsigned int j;
  if (c==4) 
    j = 1; 
  else
    j *= 2;
  // does this have undefined behaviour for c != 4 ?
  printf("j:%u ",j);
  printf("c:%d\n",c);
}
[link to test in Cerberus and Compiler Explorer]
